issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
I keep getting this error:

ITMS-90529: "Invalid package. Applications built with sdk 9.0 or later must be packaged as proper IPA files."

Any suggestions on what to do
fields.summary: Can build with SDK 5 and submit to itunes

comments.body:
Hello Peter Ladis,

Could you please test with released SDK and CLI version. Now released version is available for supporting iOS 9 then let us know if you get the error again with details.
https://community.appcelerator.com/topic/3339/5-0-0-ga-now-available
Thanks for the inconvenience.
